ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol :) Thanks! So I was starting to get it right :) My SK is the only char of mine who dies in the fight..not running to guards..her kills are more sacrifices
ygData.messageBody:
Lol :) Thanks! So I was starting to get it right :) My
SK is the only char of mine who dies in the fight..not
running to guards..her kills are more sacrifices to
her god too. :) Arrogant part I have not got yet..but
I'm only lvl 3 :)

Thanks :) I'll check out that website now! now that EQ
is down for awhile :( sigh...

Saelena - DE Shadow Knight
Going to miss my EQ fix with this patch happening :(


--- "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...> wrote:
> If your interested in roleplaying a DE then you can
> get lots of material
> about how DEs, or the Teir'Dal, from the 'Library of
> the First Born'
> (http://firstborn.eqhq.com/). There is a whole role
> playing section on
> there that makes good reading.


> Nenadar W'Veryn
> Shadow Knight of The Ebon Army
> Tallon Zek
